Hardy bụ onye ode akwụkwọ, odeakụkọ, onye na -ese ihe ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Venus Fly Trapeze Theater Company, nke rụpụtara ihe nrụpụta mbụ 8 kemgbe 1995

Ọ kụzirila ma kụziere ya ihe na Ngalaba Drama na Mahadum Rhodes (1996-98) ma nọgide na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'iji ihe nkiri dị ka ngwa nkuzi site na nkuzi na nhazi ogbako maka Grahamstown Foundation's National School Festival (1996-2003)
Ugbu a ọ na-edepụta egwuregwu ọhụrụ maka onye isi South Africa a ma ama Jaco Bouwer

O nwere ahụmahụ afọ isii dị ka onye nta akụkọ na-enweghị onwe ya, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na-enye ọrụ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka mbipụta gụnyere magazin SL, Rage.co.za na Art South Africa, na ahụmahụ 5 afọ na mgbasa ozi
Ọrụ ya na Keyline Magazine nwetara Silver Loerie 2001
Na 2001, yana Peet Pienaar na Heidi Chisholm, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na imewe Daddy Buy Me A Pony.
Egosiwo nka dijitalụ na mgbasa ozi ya na ihe ngosi dị iche iche nke mpaghara na nke mba ụwa na ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya South Africa na Ars Electronica na Austria na 2002
Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere ihe nrite ihe owuwu 2003 na asọmpi nka nka ọwa ọhụrụ 2003
Ọrụ dijitalụ ya ugbu a gụnyere mmekorita ọhụrụ ya na Francois Naude na ọrụ na-enyocha ntụgharị asụsụ na ịgụ na South Africa.
Akụkọ ifo ya apụtala na "Donga",  Litnet,  na Ọchị Ọ na-apụ Kwa Afọ, " Chimurenga "  na na Magazin AFRO
O sonyere na 2003 Crossing Border Festival na Den Hagen, Netherlands, ya na ndị edemede South Africa ibe Ivan Vladislavic, Lesego Rampolokeng, Phaswane Mpe, K
O mechaala akụkọ ifo maka akwụkwọ foto nke Pieter Hugo, nke e bipụtara na 2007 ma jikọta ya na Miles Keylock, Adam Haupt na Julian Jonker na akwụkwọ egwu South Africa.

Ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi, M hụrụ gị n'anya Jet Li, nke e kere na mmekorita ya na Jaco Bouwer bụ akụkụ nke transmediale.06: nhọrọ vidiyo, International Film Festival Rotterdam (IFFR) nhọrọ nke afọ 2006 ma nye ya ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Ememme Chileno Internacional Del Cortometraje De Santiago n'afọ 2006.
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye edemede na onye nkuzi maka CAPE Africa Platform
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Bowling Club, ọrụ mmekọ ọnụ ọhụrụ nke onye omenkà na onye mmebe Peet Pienaar hiwere

Ọ na-enye aka mgbe niile na nnọkọ dị iche iche na nyiwe, gụnyere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya Underground Conference haziri Fred Devries na ụlọ akwụkwọ Wits maka nyocha gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na VANSA (The Visual Arts Network of SA) na-eto eto curators ogbako mere na Robben Island
